name: Ayomide Ibiteye
title: Software Engineer
bio: Hey there! I'm Ayomide, a passionate Software Engineer with a love for creating beautiful, functional, and user-centered digital experiences.

I specialize in React and the modern JavaScript ecosystem, building everything from SaaS platforms to developer tools. My work focuses on clean code, intuitive interfaces, and solving real-world problems.
When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open source, or working on side projects that push my skills further.
